Epay is a simple, simulated digital wallet application designed to help you manage your money, perform transactions, and pay bills easily. Our goal is to provide a user-friendly and engaging experience that mirrors popular payment apps.
\u2022 User Authentication (Login & Sign up)\n \u2022 Digital Wallet Management\n \u2022 Mobile Recharge & Bill Payments\n \u2022 Secure Transaction History\n \u2022 Interactive Offers & Rewards
This application was developed as a project to demonstrate the core functionalities of a modern digital wallet. It\'s a comprehensive example of modular app design, focusing on simplicity and user engagement. Key architectural components used include *MVVM pattern, **Kotlin coroutines, and modern **AndroidX libraries*.
Security is paramount, even in a simulated environment. Epay employs *industry-standard encryption (AES-256)* for all stored data. User authentication is secured via *BiometricPrompt API* integration (fingerprint/face unlock) and standard PIN/password methods. We adhere to conceptual KYC (Know Your Customer) guidelines to ensure responsible simulated use.
The team is committed to continuously improving the Epay experience. Planned features include: \n\u2022 *Budgeting Tools:* Automated classification of expenses and monthly budget tracking. \n\u2022 *Virtual Card Integration:* A simulated virtual debit card number for online transactions. \n\u2022 *P2P QR Code:* Generation and scanning of QR codes for quicker in-person transfers. \n\u2022 *Multi-language Support:* Expanding accessibility by translating the application interface.
